      • dispose

        public void dispose()

        Specified by:

      • addSystem

        public void addSystem(EntitySystem system,
             java.util.List<Entity> entities)
        Adds a system to the SystemManager.
        Parameters:
        system - The system to be added.
        entities - List of all active game entities, for determining which should be added to the system's processing list.

      • addSystem

        public EntitySystem addSystem(EntitySystem system)
        Adds a system to the SystemManager. NOTE: Do not call this after entities have been created. They will not be added to the system's processing list.
        Parameters:
        system - The system to be added.

      • process

        public void process(java.util.List<Entity> newEntities,
           java.util.List<Entity> changedEntities,
           java.util.List<Entity> removedEntities,
           float deltaSeconds)
        Processes all incoming, outgoing, and modified Entities to determine which systems should be notified. Then, runs all system processing.
        Parameters:
        newEntities - Incoming entities.
        changedEntities - Modified entities.
        removedEntities - Outgoing entities.

      • systemPerformance

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> systemPerformance()
        Returns:
        A map of system names with their respective delta times, for measuring performance.
